title: New: Rosie Carney – Better Man
content:
Heart-wrenchingly beautiful.

Very, very excited to hear more from Ireland’s Rosie Carney.

I was the anchor that slept in your sand / how can we sail if you’re stuck to this land

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
